metadata.title: CVE-2017-15670 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.27 contains an off-by-one error leading to a heap-based buffer overflow in the glob function in glob.c, related to the processing of home directories using the ~ operator followed by a long string.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.27-3ubuntu1').
